ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E6 + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<7> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <8> 58mm UV Filter + <9> Additional 58mm UV Filter + <10> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> LCD Screen Protectors + <14> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with 55-250mm Lens + 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack + Filter + Accessory Kit
